definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Residential carpenters erect all types of homes, including apartments and townhouses.
sentences.chinese: 住宅木匠會建造各式各樣的房屋，例如公寓和市政廳。

sentences.english: Bill didn't go to college, now that he was apprenticed to a carpenter.
sentences.chinese: 貝爾沒有去上大學，因爲他學徒做了木匠。

sentences.english: The carpenter working on the rafter passed his axe down to his mate below.
sentences.chinese: 在椽子上幹活的木匠將斧子傳給下面的夥伴。

sentences.english: The tree was happy, because he knew that the carpenter would make him into a treasure chest.
sentences.chinese: 這棵樹非常高興，因爲它相信木匠會把它做成珠寶箱。

sentences.english: He took a job as a carpenter with the task of building a recording studio.
sentences.chinese: 於是他承接了修建一個錄音棚的木匠活。

sentences.english: We contracted with a local carpenter for the woodwork in our new boat.
sentences.chinese: 我們把新船的木工活承包給了當地的一個木匠。

sentences.english: The carpenter put the edges of the boards in line.
sentences.chinese: 木匠把木板挨邊放整齊。

sentences.english: He followed the sounds and came upon the busy Carpenters.
sentences.chinese: 它循聲來到正在忙碌的木匠們跟前。

sentences.english: Thee carpenter singing his as he measures his plank or beam.
sentences.chinese: 木匠在歌唱着，一邊比量着他的木板或梁木。

sentences.english: For instance, my neighbor is a master carpenter.
sentences.chinese: 例如，我的鄰居是一個熟練的木匠。

sentences.english: But the Elephant did not forget the kindness of the Carpenters.
sentences.chinese: 但是，大象沒有忘記木匠們的恩情。

sentences.english: We need a carpenter to detach this bookshelf from the wall.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要一名木匠將書架從牆上拆下來。

sentences.english: What about a carpenter or painter?
The carpenter was hammering in his workshop.
Father still plies his trade as a carpenter.
At an early age, I was apprenticed to a carpenter.
sentences.chinese: 我小時候曾給木匠當過學徒。

definition: hooped barrel/to handmake a wooden barrel
